meanings.definition: Members of a paramilitary organization associated with the Nazi Party in Germany.
meanings.sent1: The brownshirts marched in formation during the rally.
meanings.sent2: He was known to be a loyal brownshirt, always following the orders.
meanings.sent3: The brownshirts decided to have a picnic in their uniforms.
meanings.sent4: The brownshirts' unity was as strong as their uniforms.
meanings.sent5: The brownshirts' presence was intimidating at the event.

meanings.definition: A supporter or member of a fascist or authoritarian group.
meanings.sent1: She became a brownshirt after attending their meetings.
meanings.sent2: The brownshirt was vocal about their extreme beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The brownshirt proudly displayed their group's flag.
meanings.sent4: His actions mirrored those of a dedicated brownshirt.
meanings.sent5: The brownshirt's loyalty never wavered, even in difficult times.

meanings.definition: A type of uniform worn by members of a paramilitary organization.
meanings.sent1: The brownshirts' uniforms were easily recognizable.
meanings.sent2: He proudly put on his brownshirt before the event.
meanings.sent3: The brownshirt's color matched the earth tones of the forest.
meanings.sent4: The brownshirt's fabric was durable and practical.
meanings.sent5: The brownshirt's emblem was prominently displayed on the chest.
